CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
CurrentVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
OldVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
CurrentVersion.description: With Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
OldVersion.description:
With
Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no
longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and
tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and
no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Centrally manage branding for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your sites and pages.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Centrally manage branding for your organization
OldVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your sites and pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
OldVersion.description: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation
CurrentVersion.description: With Voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. This feature uses AI to filter out all background noise, including other people's voices. By leveraging your voice profile, this advanced noise suppression capability ensures only the user’s voice is transmitted. Whether you are in a busy office, a noisy cafe, or a crowded airport, you can communicate with confidence and clarity. Voice isolation is powered by our advanced deep learning, speech services, and audio processing technology, and it shows our dedication to solving user problems with AI and enhancing audio quality and experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation
OldVersion.description:

isolation is powered by our advanced deep learning, speech services, and
audio processing technology, and it shows our dedication to solving user
problems with AI and enhancing audio quality and experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Create a Viva Pulse from scratch
CurrentVersion.description: Build your Viva Pulse from scratch by creating your own questions or choosing from the question library.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Create a Viva Pulse from scratch
OldVersion.description: Build your Viva Pulse from scratch by creating your own questions or choosing from the question library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Select Viva Pulse Questions from a Library
CurrentVersion.description: Create a Viva Pulse using research-backed questions found by browsing or searching the question library.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Select Viva Pulse Questions from a Library
OldVersion.description: Create a Viva Pulse using research-backed questions found by browsing or searching the question library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
OldVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
OldVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Boosted News Notifications
CurrentVersion.description:
As an enhancement to the existing news notifications in Viva Connections, users will now also receive a news notifications when news is boosted on the organisation's news site and the news post has an audience target set.
The navigational behaviour will be the same as existing news notifications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Boosted News Notifications
OldVersion.description:
As an enhancement to the existing news notifications in Viva Connections, users will now also receive a news notifications when news is boosted on the organisation's news site and the news post has an audience target set.
The navigational behaviour will be the same as existing news notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status for mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status
OldVersion.description:

mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the
participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the
duration of the meeting.
